description: 按产品首字母分组求和 — SUMIF + 通配符

cases.name: 按首字母分组求和 SUMIF
cases.message: Open the file bench/external/spreadsheetbench/spreadsheetbench_verified_400/spreadsheet/44628/1_44628_init.xlsx. Group and sum the total sales of all products by using the first letter of each product's name, such as 'A' from the product SKU 'A2-3442-2244', and aggregate the sales for all SKUs starting with the same letter. Display these results in D3:G3.
